item.title: Bags of rubbish & a quantity of cardboard boxes dumped by the litter bin on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 near the 401/469 Bus Stop, 27th July
item.description:
2 bags of rubbish & a quantity of cardboard has been dumped by the litter bin on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 near the 401/469 Bus Stop, approximately 25 metres from the junction with Halt Robin Road Belvedere DA17. Would arrangements be put in place to remove the rubbish as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broekn glass strewn over crossing, 27th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chelsfield Road, Poverest, London
